meanings.definition: relating to the process of reproducing graphic materials
meanings.sent1: The reprographic machine quickly copied the colorful poster.
meanings.sent2: The office used reprographic technology to duplicate the design.
meanings.sent3: The reprographic device decided to print a rainbow instead of black and white.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a reprographic printer, duplicating ideas effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The reprographic process transformed the plain image into a vibrant masterpiece.

meanings.definition: a reproduction made by reprographic methods
meanings.sent1: The shop offered high-quality reprographics of famous paintings.
meanings.sent2: She needed a reprographic of the document for her presentation.
meanings.sent3: The reprographic on the wall winked mischievously at the visitors.
meanings.sent4: His memory was like a collection of reprographics, each one a copy of a moment.
meanings.sent5: The artist's studio was filled with beautiful reprographics of nature scenes.
